title: Siemens Internship Opportunity
description: Siemens is offering a 3-month on-site internship in Lahore, focused on contributing to the CodeBench team working on an Eclipse/CDT-based IDE. This opportunity provides hands-on experience with embedded software tools and Linux-based environments. Open to multiple domains, the last date to apply is July 24, 2025.
